description:
Easier to clean, easier to drink from. Turn your Kanteen Classic into an on-the-go drink bottle. The silicone spout has a high flow rate, and good leak resistance.

  • Updated with a removeable silicone mouthpiece, making thorough cleaning easier than ever
  • Soft silicone spout for fast drinking
  • Quick attachment loop
  • Cap is leak resistant
  • Compatible with all Kanteen Classic sizes
  • Dishwasher safe
name: Klean Kanteen Sport Cap
